JOB OBJECTIVE
Surrounded by my family-owned tradi�onal retail business environment, I am always engaged in understanding
business and marke�ng models.
By understanding the vital role of technology and marke�ng in Southeast Asia's recent emerging business

ACTIVITIES
Hobbies & interests: Travel, drawing, music, comedy-drama movies
Apart from volunteering for a number of charitable programs and organiza�ons, I am proud for ini�a�ng and
implemen�ng my own two chari�es. In 2013, I organized “Tết for homeless people”, giving 300 presents (rice
and other requisites) in one night for homeless people in Hanoi during the Lunar New Year. In 2014, I hosted

A combined branding and web agency
focused on user-centric design 
and objective stategy
1218 Chestnut St, 4th Floor
Philadelphia, PA 19107
215-925-1980
easternstandard.com
To whom this may concern:
I live in The United States and am a founding partner/owner of Philadelphia-based agency, Eastern Standard and 
have worked in the industry for 20 years. Eastern standard is a combined branding and web agency with focuses 
on objective strategy and user-centric design.
I have had the pleasure of knowing Thiện Học coming up on two years. We came to meet through a mutual friend 
while I was traveling. I soon learned that we both shared similar lines of work. pursing graphic arts path with a 
strong understanding and love for developing brand systems. Not only does Hoc possess an eye for the visual 
creative he also possesses a strong understanding on the marketing side and the critical thinking skills needed 
to lead a team through the necessary steps in developing a brand from early concept through to the end with a 
highly developed package for the client. We also share something else in common in our love for teaching. I know 
Hoc is well suited to have a successful career in our field. The work that he has shared with me, often asking for my 
critique, is on a level that I normally find from someone who has been in his field for many more years. Because 
of his hard work, passion, dedication, and deep understanding of process, he displays the abilities of a much more 
seasoned designer. Only personal drive, love for the craft, and true critical thinking would offer him such abilities. 
I often wish I’d be able to hire him myself, knowing without a doubt he’d be a true asset. 
Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions.
Best regards,  
David M. Wolf
Founding Partner, Creative Director  
Eastern Standard, LLC  
davidw@easternstandard.com
